class.name: wxSpinButton
class.description: A wxSpinButton has two small up and down (or left and right) arrow buttons.

flag.name: wxSP_HORIZONTAL
flag.description: Specifies a horizontal spin button (note that this style is not supported in wxGTK).

flag.name: wxSP_ARROW_KEYS
flag.description: The user can use arrow keys to change the value.

flag.name: wxSP_WRAP
flag.description: The value wraps at the minimum and maximum.

type.name: EVT_SPIN
type.description: Generated whenever an arrow is pressed.

type.name: EVT_SPIN_UP
type.description: Generated when left/up arrow is pressed.

type.name: EVT_SPIN_DOWN
type.description: Generated when right/down arrow is pressed.
